author: A_Brickset_user
title: Take Off
review: This set is a good one, just like the Red Tiger and Rocket Car because of the extra man that helps out. The chopper looks great in that black and striped colors. I wish the heads could be more interesting but it is really good still. The chopper could have longer blades to make it more realistic but i don't think that is a problem. This is just a good set overall.

author: hustla187
title: The Best Helicopter
review: Minifig scale helicopters are always pretty good, just like this one. I really like the color scheme and the stripe along the side. There are also supplies like tools and a fuel barrel in this set. I have to say this is the best minifig scale helicopter Lego has ever made. Period.
